data.text: @skiqueen17 @KirstieMAllsopp very happy to say I got 4 rolls yesterday! some wide for sticking bows and some narrow for hidden sticking of wrappings😍this was from a haberdashery store as it is used in crafting.
@KirstieMAllsopp I love your Christmas shows and you have inspired me to make my own Christmas cards x
@TheBaileygough @KirstieMAllsopp Not at all just stating facts. Least needy person you will meet. Just tell it how it is!
@KirstieMAllsopp Have been watching it since its started absolutely love it 🎄

@KirstieMAllsopp Screw the haters. You rock. Why wouldn't you use the services of the amazing crafters from your show. My mum and I had a lovely evening last night watching you on catch up whilst making fabric wreaths. https://t.co/1MQOIFxVxv
@KirstieMAllsopp You aren’t interested in me and I am highly talented and award winning
@KirstieMAllsopp Don’t let them bother you - the show is ACE 👏🏻
@freewheelfrance @KirstieMAllsopp Agree and an unnecessary idea to boot.
@KirstieMAllsopp Please can tell me why were the crafters only given 4 hours in tonight’s episode ? Everyone would have improved with an extra hour or two.

@KirstieMAllsopp Can you please ask your guests to stop giving Santa’s secret away? How on earth would we read the instructions on games before wrapping when the presents are all wrapped at the North Pole?
@MaryellenMAZZA @KirstieMAllsopp Oh this is so true! 😼That guy on your programme has such a flair with decorating windows. ❄️☃️
@KirstieMAllsopp I love the programme its a must watch for me and my crafting daughter

@KirstieMAllsopp Kristie - if you can why shouldn’t you? You’re employing small business & independents. It would somehow be spun the other way if you did do it all - Smug Kirstie even guilds her own lilies! 😂 Do your thing & enjoy it 👍🏻🎄👏🏻

@KirstieMAllsopp If you were a rich man getting his PA to wrap/maybe even get his wife's gift it wouldn't be an issue. As for employing a talented artist to decorate your windows don't blame you, if it's the guy from the show he is amazing! Live your life the way YOU want to, life's too short!

@KirstieMAllsopp Now now Kirstie, you’re letting them wind you up again! The next press person you meet give them a swift kick in the taco and all will be well again! 😆 #TuesdayThoughts #fuckthehaters https://t.co/szXNHbxDH1
